home.initialGreeting: I'm a front end programmer from Mexico, exactly from a place called Cuernavaca, Morelos.
home.informationHome: I'm a software developer with a taste for front end development, although I also have to say that full stack development really catches my attention.

about.history: When I was 13 years old my parents bought me my first computer, I remember that one day while watching videos on Youtube a video caught my attention; create your own application with HTML and CSS, I remember that I did not understand anything about what the video said, I remember that I only watched a few minutes and decided to close the video for demotivation. It wasn't until high school where I learned a little bit of programming and started to get into the world of coding. Undoubtedly front end programming managed to capture my attention and I focused my efforts on understanding technologies, currently React JS is one of the front end technologies that I am using more and to which I have dedicated more time.
about.gftResume:
• Bug fixing of the web application by means of support feedback list.
• Continuous training on its framework (Cells and Lit Element) based on web components.
• Use of the best front end development rules through its documentation.
• Training on common information filtering issues and banking vulnerabilities.
• The project was based on agile SCRUM methodology.
about.indraResume:
• Creation of components for the mobile application of BBVA bank.
• Solution and correction of bugs and continuous improvement through constant feedback.
• Continuous training on its framework (Cells and Lit Element) based on web components.
• Use of the best front end development rules through its documentation.
• The project was based on agile SCRUM methodology.
about.linnResume:
• Support the systems support section of the payment of services.
• Support to implement new functionalities to the system both web and Android application.
• Update obsolete designs of the web platform with HTML5, GSP, Bootstrap, SASS, Responsive Design.
• Support in backend through Groovy programming language in conjunction with the Grails framework.
about.jorgeResume:
• Redesign web page.
• Display new web layout with Figma.
• Create backups of web page in the contracted server.
• Set up new website on server.
• Code new website from new design with HTML5,CSS and responsive Design.
about.socialResume:
• Create visual web designs by means of Adobe packages (Photoshop and Illustrator).
• Interactive web layout with Figma.
about.issteResume:
• To support the development of the ERD diagram and subsequently the development of the MySQL database using MySQL Workbench.
• Develop web platform using HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, Responsive Design, JQuery and under the SCRUM methodology.
• Support back-end development by means of PHP programming language and its framework Symfony, we developed the necessary functionalities for the web system.

projects.repositoryCrudGrails: Crud created with grails and groovy, CRUD has the option to register doctors, hospitals and appointments, GORM persistence was used and validation added to avoid registering appointments at certain times and when a doctor already has an appointment assigned.
projects.repositoryCartoon: The cartoon used in my portfolio was created only with CSS, JavaScript and HTML, only HTML tags were used to create the drawing, from there pseudoclases were used to create shadows and some hair sections.
projects.repositorySpring: CRUD created with Spring Boot, the crud is similar to the hospital CRUD only as a difference JPA persistence was used and as a database manager used by MySQL Workbench.
projects.repositoryPokedex: Pokedex application made with React JS and the public API PokeApi, CSS and JSX were used to create the application components, to display a DEMO GitHub Pages was used to mount on a server.
projects.repositoryPythonFile: Script made with Python to encrypt text file information, the user has the option to upload PDF files, DOC or documents containing text for receive an exact copy of the file only that with the encrypted information, the script can also decrypt the information by a password.
projects.repositoryChatPython: Real-time chat done with Python, the chat encrypts the message at the time of receiving it, also has the option to decrypt the message by means of a password and has options to connect to a port and start a chat from the client.

contact.moreInfoContact: If you are interested in my work, and you have a job opportunity for me, I will be happy to hear the proposal, I await your message.

knowme.paragraph1: I'm Oliver, I'm a 25-year-old boy from Mexico, exactly from the state of Cuernavaca Morelos, I studied programming at the Emiliano Zapata Technological University, I remember that my dream was to study Mechatronics Engineering.
knowme.paragraph2: For reasons that I don't know, I couldn't be accepted in that engineering field, so the following year I tried to take my exam again. I remember that I was undecided about what to choose because I felt that if I tried mechatronics again, I could have the same result, then I remembered that in high school I got They taught web development, at the time I loved development too much, so I decided to give Systems Engineering a try.
knowme.paragraph3: My working life began when the ISSSTE Hospital gave me the opportunity to carry out my professional practices developing a course registration system, given the little time they gave us (4 months), we could not completely finish the system but, the hospital was aware Therefore, they hired us as project programmers and we managed to finish the system correctly, this helped us a lot because they gave us recognition because the system was a complete success, currently the system is still in use without the need for our maintenance, because the system It has a section for updating logos, images, banners and diploma information.
knowme.paragraph4: During my work experience I had bad personal experiences with some of the companies that trusted me, the truth is I was very new and did not know how to be or how to respond to certain circumstances, but it was not all bad, I had opportunities that in my life I thought I would I would have and I was able to work in companies that were a great growth for me.
knowme.paragraph5: Leaving aside my work life, I would like to tell you about my tastes, I am not really a person of extreme hobbies or strange tastes, I love to enjoy a quiet time listening to music in my room, while I work or have free time, I also have certain I like digital design, I love designing systems too much, both for Android and desktop. ReactJS is currently my main framework, I simply love the way I can develop systems, I have tried to enter companies that ask for ReactJS, but for the same reason that I have never been in a company that has a React project, they do not give me that opportunity that I have been looking for so much, I hope that my portfolio and my personal projects are of some use and I manage to enter a company that trusts me.
